name: Cooking Giannibal
description:
This is for the game jam of GameDev.tv, our very first game on itch.io. It is inspired by Hannibal Lecter from the Hannibal Lecter series by Thomas Harris.
It's buggy, without our models for the characters and music, but it's our first game and our first game jam. We will complete it in the future! Thanks for playing; we hope you'll like it
